UCR.name: Deployment Reports
UCR.description: The IBM UrbanCode Release Deployment Reports plugin provides an example of using the UCR plugin framework and Java REST  API client introduced in UCR 6.1.1.0 to generate email based reports. Two example report formats are included, which are  rendered using data extracted from UCR via the REST API and rendered into HTML content via the Apache Velocity template  engine. The reports are delivered using the same email notification configuration used by the main UCR product into  which the plugin is deployed.

notes: Minor updates to formatting of email content.
Minor updates to formatting of email content.
Updated libraries.
Updated libraries.

Enhancements to Integration Row.  Added historical view of persisted reports. Added Deployments Summary Reports and enhanced other reports.  Added parameters for remote queries of reports.  Removed sample data generation.

Enhancements to Integration Row.  Added historical view of persisted reports. Added Deployments Summary Reports and enhanced other reports.  Added parameters for remote queries of reports.  Removed sample data generation.

UCR.name: Rally
UCR.description: Rally is an Agile project management tool for planning, scheduling, and tracking iterations and releases.

notes: Rally Plugin for UrbanCode Release

UCR.name: IBM UrbanCode Deploy
UCR.description: The IBM UrbanCode Deploy plug-in provides a full integration between IBM UrbanCode Release and IBM UrbanCode Deploy. It  replaces the built-in integration for versions 6.1.1.5 and later of IBM UrbanCode Release. The plug-in also improves  performance for the first full synchronization and for delta updates on subsequent synchronizations.

notes: The first version of this plugin supports full sync (import all UCD entities) and delta sync (import only objects that have been changed in UCD) with any IBM UrbanCode Deploy server (UCD 6.1.1.4 and above).
Performance of the full sync has been improved and delta sync should not take more than a few seconds.
Compatible with IBM UrbanCode Release 6.1.1.5.

Performance of the full sync has been improved and delta sync should not take more than a few seconds.
Compatible with IBM UrbanCode Release 6.1.1.5.

UCR.name: ServiceNow
UCR.description: The ServiceNow plug-in allows UrbanCode Release to perform create, read, update and delete operations on ServiceNow  records. This plug-in also evaluates SNOW approvals and resolve UrbanCode Release Deployments phase approvals.

notes: Initial Public Release
Initial Public Release

UCR.name: Jenkins for IBM UrbanCode Release
UCR.description: Jenkins is a continuous integration server that utilizes a plug-in model to support interactions with other DevOps  products. Jenkins jobs can be synchronized using the Jenkins plug-in for IBM UrbanCode Release with the UrbanCode  Release server allowing Jenkin jobs to be ran as part of a release plan.

notes: An initial version that supports importing jobs and related information from Jenkins.
Support for parameterized jobs has been added.

UCR.name: Ansible Tower
UCR.description: The Red Hat© Ansible© Tower centralize and control your IT infrastructure with a visual dashboard, role-based access  control, job scheduling, integrated notifications and graphical inventory management. The Ansible Tower plug-in

notes: The first version of this plugin supports full sync (import all UCD entities) and delta sync (import only objects that have been changed in UCD) with any IBM UrbanCode Deploy server (UCD 6.1.1.4 and above).
Performance of the full sync has been improved and delta sync should not take more than a few seconds.
Compatible with IBM UrbanCode Release 6.1.1.5.
Provide a new HTTP Timeout field to allow timeout to be set on requests made to UCR and UCD
Support property file encryption.

UCR.name: HP Quality Center (ALM)
UCR.description: The HP ALM plugin for UrbanCode Release provides visibility into project entities, such as defects and requirements,  from the impact analysis view of UrbanCode Release.

notes: Urbancode Release integration.
PLUGIN_FILES.description: HP ALM is a set of web-based software lifecycle management tools. It offers software quality assurance, including requirements management, test management and business process testing for IT and application environments.

notes: Urbancode Release integration.

UCR.name: Jira for IBM UrbanCode Release
UCR.description: Jira is an issue tracking tool. You can use the tool to capture and organize issues, assign work, and track activities.  Issues can be anything from development tasks, code errors, project tasks, help-desk tickets, or human resource request  forms. The JIRA product is developed by Atlassian.

notes: Initial JIRA Plugin for IBM UrbanCode Release
- Support for mapping JIRA Work Items to Release Changes.
- Release Applications and JIRA Projects with the same name will be automatically mapped.
Support property file encryption.
Resolve assignment of the NONE severity.
Mitigate NullPointerException for non existant JIRA Priority.
Added proxy support.
Added support for mapping JIRA Projects and Components as UCR Applications.
- One Change in UrbanCode Release will be created for every Project and Component found on an Issue.
- The Auto Map Applications checkbox has been removed. The same functionality can be found using the value `Project` in Auto Map Applications dropdown value.
- In the Manual Mapping selection boxes, to differentiate from Project or conflicting Component names, Components are named using the following syntax: `Project: Component`.
All property lists are now alphabetically sorted.
Resolved an error occurring when the mapped JIRA Release did not have a valid Release Date.
Added the ability to import Jira epics as UCR Initiatives.  Child Jira tickets will be imported and associated to the proper initiative.
Enhancements to Epics as Initiatives
Now imports Jira Releases as UCR Releases
Custom Issue Types are now imported as initiatives, and this uses custom issue links to associate changes.
Custom Issue Types bug fixes; Now can exclude Jira Issue Types from being imported
APAR PH17367 UCR application mapping select box to be scripted.
Adding "Jira Project IDs" field under Application Mapping for considering specified Projects for issue search.
Fix the Out of Memory issue
Change Jira status to Status types

UCR.name: CA Nolio
UCR.description: The CA Nolio plug-in provides for the integration of UrbanCode Release with CA Release Automation Server. The plugin  supports sync of Applications, Environments, Application Processes, Snapshots (Deployment Plan), and Inventories. It  also handles the execution of generic processes. Both full and delta synchronization is supported.

notes: Improved sync to remove applications and templates that no longer exist in Nolio.
Added a check for paused state of deployments and a subsequent comment.
Added comments for percentage completed of an active deployment.
Added parameter passing to deployment task execution.
Added a 'Project Name' field to integration properties.
Added syncing of components and component versions.
Added a customizable full sync interval in minutes to define when items will be imported.

UCR.name: Slack for IBM UrbanCode Release
UCR.description: Slack is a team collaboration tool. This plug-in sends notifications to Slack in a specified channel.

notes: First Demo version of the Slack Plugin for UCR with the following plugin steps: Failure Listener and Notification Task
RFE 135552 - Added proxy support.
RFE 135552 - Added proxy support.
Create a channel with the deployment name, and invite users to join this channel.

UCR.name: Microsoft Team Foundation Server (TFS)
UCR.description: The Microsoft TFS plugin for UrbanCode Release provides visibility into work items from the impact analysis view of  UrbanCode Release. Visual Studio Team Services (formerly VSO) is also supported.

notes: Support property file encryption.

UCR.name: XL Deploy
UCR.description: The XL Deploy plug-in provides for integration of UrbanCode Release with an XebiaLabs XL Deploy server. The plug-in  imports applications, environments, deployment packages, and deployment tasks from XL Deploy as objects in UrbanCode  Release. Both full and delta synchronization are supported.

notes: The initial version of this plugin supports both full sync and delta sync. Full sync
compares all objects in XL Deploy with all integration objects in UCR, while delta sync
only compares what's changed since last execution.
APAR PH14403 - Spaces in object names causing failures.
APAR PH17727 - Missing PercentCodec class in Check Authentication task.
APAR PH18118 - Missing PercentCodec class in Execute Task.
APAR PH18118 - Re-release fix for Missing PercentCodec with updated classpath.
APAR PH20204 - Archive completed deployment tasks in XL Deploy.
